Reis Magos, Goa

UKIYO-444 4 Bedroom with Private Swimming Pool and Kid’s Pool | Lakeside Gazebo

10 Guests | 4 Bedrooms

Lonavala, Maharashtra

UKIYO-228 5 Bedroom Modern decor villa, pool with loungers

12 Guests | 5 Bedrooms

Alibaug, Maharashtra

UKIYO-229 6 Bedroom villa with an open-to-sky shamiana and a private pool

15 Guests | 6 Bedrooms

Alibaug, Maharashtra

Listen what our guests have to say

A beautiful house with great interiors, scenic view and much more. An approachable host and a clean house everyday. Ukiyo-425 is a perfect getaway space.

Tanishi Ravani Stayed at: Ukiyo-425

Great stay at Ukiyo-183 with exceptional staff, well-organized management, and beautiful amenities.

Huma Qureshi Stayed at: Ukiyo-183

Highly recommend Ukiyo Stays for an exceptional stay at the stunning Ukiyo-209 with great hospitality and cleanliness.

Rajkumar Rao Stayed at: Ukiyo-209

Great stay at Ukiyo-693 with amazing community, and a seamless booking experience with an always available sales team managing all requirements.

Allu Arjun Stayed at: Ukiyo-693

Unforgettable luxury stay at Ukiyo-497 and 688 in Goa with mouth-watering cuisine and attentive service from co-founder and villa specialist of Ukiyo Stays.

Gaurav Gandhi Stayed at: Ukiyo-497 & Ukiyo-688

I had an incredible experience at Ukiyo - 684! The service was perfect and truly made my visit unforgettable..

Mira Gulati Stayed at: Ukiyo-684

Recommended by our travelers

Stayed with them a few times now. The properties are gorgeous- they work with nearly every good one across all platforms. Hospitality is top notch- food couldn't have been better. Most importantly the assistance and help of the team is absolutely unparalleled- which is what make them the go-to for me for finding and booking any property. Its like a friend in the group who know all about all the properties that exist and will find and book the best one for you and ensure no troubles happen with the stay.
Pratik Agarwal
2023-05-23
I have stayed at the Kasauli property(Woodside Meadows) suggested by Dhrumil Vikram. it is a wonderful property. We all had a great time. The owner of the property is very professional and even the cook/staff is very polite. Hope to visit again to any of the properties suggested by UKIYO STAYS. Thanks again.
Harry Sodhi
2023-05-16
What a convenient getaway. Warm staff, super clean arena, a perfect staycation for you and the fam jam. Thanks a a brilliant stay El house 🤍
Karan Jotwani
2023-05-15
Just the most stunning villa I’ve stayed at in a while. Perfect for big groups, great vibe, super spacious, efficient caretakers, a well designed villa, beautiful rooms and interiors. We as a group loved the space so much that we didn’t step out anywhere and stayed in the whole time! 🙂 Loved the experience. Thank you, Ukiyo stays!
khyati panchmatia
2023-05-15
Beautiful villa with extremely clean rooms and a lovely front yard. Clean pool and the caretakers were also really helpful.
muriel d'souza
2023-05-15
Very nice property and well made with lots of detailing . Spacious rooms and bathrooms well maintained . Staff is also very Curtosy and helpful . Overall a great experience. Thank you Ukiyo stays
Kunal Yeole
2023-05-15
Superb
Ankita Shah
2023-05-09
Good hospitality! And aesthetic villa ! Must visit i if in alibaugh ! Thankyou @ukiyostays
tanya sharma
2023-05-04
Loved the stay and staff was soo humble must visit guys !
Summit bhardwaj
2023-05-04
Fantastic property! Great support and house help staff, would really recommend to go for a nice outing.
avinash mukherjee
2023-05-04
View All
